headline: Hallmark’s TV Chief Departs After Dispute Over Same-Sex Ads
abstract: Bill Abbott’s departure was announced weeks after the network apologized for pulling a commercial that showed brides kissing.
lead_paragraph: Hallmark's top television executive, Bill Abbott, is leaving the company weeks after the Hallmark Channel confronted a withering backlash over its decision to pull commercials that featured a same-sex wedding.
keywords: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
